description: This tool searchs in your Inventory the combination of artifacts with the highest damage.
The artifacts used are the ones currently **filtered** in the Inventory section of the calculator.
Consider adding as many filters as possible to reduce the number of combinations to evaluate.
OPTIMIZER.ARTIFACTS.title: Optimize artifacts

OPTIMIZER.ARTIFACTS_ALLOW_ONLY: Evaluate only combinations with the following set effects
OPTIMIZER.ARTIFACTS_ALLOW_PIECE_0: Evaluate combinations with no set effects

description: This tool evaluates all the combination between offensive, defensive and elemental
(potions) food to find the combination with the highest damage. All foods
are set to delicious by default.
OPTIMIZER.FOOD.title: Optimize food

description: This tool allows to make a cross-comparison between different weapons, main stats,
substats and artifacts sets, finding the combination with the highest damage.
All combinations in this optimizer are configured through commands, you can read
the documentation for more information.
OPTIMIZER.GENERAL.title: General optimizer

description: This tool evaluates all the different combination of mainstats for Sands,
Goblet and Circlet, finding the combination with the highest damage.
You can also set specific groups of mainstats to evaluate instead.
For each combination, the optimizer will use the substats that your target character
has currently equipped, replacing those repeated with the mainstat when needed.
You can also generate a set of optimal substats **for each combination** of mainstats,
using the substats optimizer. Please note that this function will considerably slow down
the process.
For more information about the substats optimizer, please go to its corresponding section.
OPTIMIZER.MAINSTAT.title: Optimize mainstat

description: This tool calculates the damage benefit obtained by adding a single roll of every substat.
It also includes elemental/physical damage bonues and healing bonus as reference.
OPTIMIZER.NEXTROLL.title: Optimize next stat roll

description: This tool evaluates all the different combination of artifact sets,
including both 4-star and 5-star sets. By default, each set is calculated
with different stacks and conditions, but you can create custom configurations
in the code editor below.
OPTIMIZER.SET.title: Optimize artifact set

description: This tool will evaluate all the different ways to distribute a given amount of
_rolls_ between a group of substats, finding the combination with the highest damage.
- **Total:** the number of rolls to distribute between substats.
- **Tier:** Which substat values to use. Tier 1 substats are commonly called _min rolls_,
while Tier 4 substats are _max rolls_. There's also an additional tier, which is the average
of all the 4 values.
You can select different substats to optimize, each of them with an specific range of `[min, max]`.
For performance reasons, the limit of substats that can be selected is 5. Also, the maximum rolls is 45,
and the maximum rolls per substat is 30.
Add filters to constraint minimum or maximum values for any character stat. This can be used, for example,
to optimize considering a energy recharge requirement. You could also set a minimum of crit rate/dmg in order
to skip more combinations and increase the performance.
**Notes:**
- The more rolls or substats to optimize, the more combinations will need to be evaluated,
slowing down the process.
- This optimizer will always assume 5-star artifacts. If your target character has 4-stat artifacts
equiped, they will be converted to 5-star before running the calculations. Characters in the party different
to the target will not be affected.
OPTIMIZER.SUBSTATS.title: Optimize substats

description: This tool evaluates all the different available weapons with different configurations
finding the one with the highest damage. All weapons are evaluated with the same
equipped artifacts (which means the substats won't be changed).
By default, each weapon is evaluated with different configurations for ranks, stacks
and conditions, but you can write your own configurations in the code editor below.
OPTIMIZER.WEAPON.title: Optimize weapons
